title: At long last
creator_credit: John Ralph, Dennis Sawyer and National Film Board of Canada
brief_description: A guided tour through the interior and behind the scenes of the new National Library of Canada in Ottawa showing modern devices for information storage and retrieval - teletype, computers, microfilm and an exhaustive card catalogue.
